summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 forwarding a January 2021 email from federal prosecutors in the Southern District of New York. The prosecutors are seeking to contact an expert witness for the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which was scheduled for July 12, 2021.

persons.name: Ghisloine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case 'United States v. Ghisloine Maxwell'. The document is about prosecutors seeking an expert witness for her trial.

events.title: Scheduled trial of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled to begin on this date in the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain concerning the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
Federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were seeking to contact an expert witness for the trial.
The trial was scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021.
The email was originally sent in January 2021 and forwarded in November 2021.
The prosecutors' names and the expert witness's name are not provided in the visible text.
